Sentencas: For different applications, such as solid oxide fuel cells, there is an interest in understanding the relationship between the microstructure and the gas permeability of plasma-sprayed coatings.
Titulo: Gas Permeability of Porous Plasma-Sprayed Coatings

Sentencas: Nevertheless, plasma spraying processes allow to elaborate coatings with singular microstructures, depending strongly on the initial material and plasma operating conditions.
Titulo: Gas Permeability of Porous Plasma-Sprayed Coatings

Sentencas: And so, the evolution of permeability is not directly linked to the porosity.
Titulo: Gas Permeability of Porous Plasma-Sprayed Coatings

Sentencas: In this work, coatings were manufactured using different initial feedstock and spray parameters to obtain various microporous structures.
Titulo: Gas Permeability of Porous Plasma-Sprayed Coatings

Sentencas: Measurements of their permeation with the pressure drop method and their open porosity just as the observation of the morphology and the structure by optical microscopy were achieved.
Titulo: Gas Permeability of Porous Plasma-Sprayed Coatings

Sentencas: The different data show that the evolution of the gas permeability with the open porosity follows the Kozeny-Carman equation.
Titulo: Gas Permeability of Porous Plasma-Sprayed Coatings

Sentencas: This result correlated with the microstructural observation highlights the relationship between the permeability and the physical properties of porous plasma-sprayed layers.
Titulo: Gas Permeability of Porous Plasma-Sprayed Coatings
